title: Activist creates community organizing space
description: the activist wants to address local housing affordability; they create a housing justice organizing space; they invite community members through trusted connections... (9 steps total)
content:
Given the activist wants to address local housing affordability
When they create a housing justice organizing space
And they invite community members through trusted connections
And they establish space charter emphasizing transparency and consensus
Then the organizing space is created at community layer
And invitations travel through web of trust
And the space has tools for decision-making and coordination
And community members can contribute safely within the space
And the moderation agent helps maintain healthy dialogue
